nav.div: Health Sciences Charter School » News » What's New » Covid19

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Georgia; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Georgia; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: We have been working hard to prepare online learning environments for all of our students. Please read all of the information below:

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Georgia; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre; margin-left: 11pt;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Please be checking our website and social media often as we will continually be giving you as many updates, resources, and answers as possible!

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Georgia; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre; margin-left: 11pt;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Students - please make sure you can access your email. There was a survey that was sent out - please take it! If you cannot access your email, please call the school ASAP.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Georgia; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre; margin-left: 11pt;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Parents - please make sure that we have the most updated contact information for your household. If you have had any address or phone number changes recently, call the school and get that information up to date!

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Georgia; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre; margin-left: 11pt;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Please reach out to us if you do not have access to digital technology (computer, Chromebook, iPad, tablet, etc.).

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Georgia; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre; margin-left: 11pt;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: We have been informed that Spectrum if offering FREE internet to students that will be available for 60 days. To enroll, call 1-844-488-8395. Installation fees will be waived.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Georgia; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre; margin-left: 11pt;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Students - your teachers have been actively updating your Google Classrooms. Check these ASAP and begin your online work.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Georgia; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre; margin-left: 11pt;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: If you cannot get online, please make arrangements to stop by the school. We have packets printed for each class. YOU ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR GETTING YOUR WORK!

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Georgia; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre; margin-left: 11pt;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: SCHOOL MEALS will be available through Buffalo Public School. Please see the attached list of instructions and locations where any student may pick up breakfast and lunch.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Georgia; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre; margin-left: 11pt;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Our lottery will still take place on April 1st. We are still accepting applications for the 2020-2021 school year. The enrollment packet can be found on our website. Any registration questions, please email Mrs. Perillo at

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Georgia; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre; margin-left: 11pt;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: All staff email addresses can be found on our website - keep in touch with your teachers! Communication will be super important through this transition, especially if you are struggling.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Georgia; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre; margin-left: 11pt;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Most importantly, STAY SAFE AND HEALTHY!! This is not a time for social gatherings. Stay at home, keep your distance, and focus on getting your work done! Exams are still in June. You will still need to pass all of your classes.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Georgia; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: If there are ANY questions, concerns, or struggles, please call the school at 716-888-4080. There will be someone here Monday-Friday 8am-3pm. We are all in this together!

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Georgia; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
span.a: List of Buffalo Public School Meal Locations

strong.span: 3.6.2019 Parent Letter from the Head of School
